products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary.  This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice.   Our electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe.  Our Splash Indigo Blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.  At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds. 
 
 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX2047 Fabric Colour: Indigo Blue Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Splash Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our moisture-resistant Splash Dark Teal electric roller blinds have a stylish and modern feel that will update any space. This saturated, dark blue electric roller is a beautiful, contemporary colour which will brighten, and enrich the space with its calming, saturated shade. 
 
Electric blinds are also perfect for hard to reach windows and add a really modern feel to any space, and are cordless and therefore child-safe by design.   At Swift Direct Blinds, when purchasing this blind you will also be able to take advantage of our free 5 year guarantee, which means investing in a piece that will stand the test of time.

products.title: Splash Smoke Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Smoke Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £133.32 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish which has wonderful light filtering properties.  Perfect for offering privacy without completely blocking out all the light.  Our Splash range is also moisture resistant making it a perfect addition within for kitchens, bathrooms and en-suites.  
 
 This Splash Smoke Blue electric roller blind will update and brighten any interior. The medium blue of the fabric will look stunning when paired with natural wooden tones and is the perfect splash of colour to compliment cool, contemporary grey shades. Our electric rollers are inherently child safe as they require no cords to operate & electric roller blinds are perfect for more dificult to reach windows as they can be operated with a remote control. They also introduce an exceptionally modern feel within the space. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Dark Teal Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £138.17 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
 This moody Dark Teal Blue electric roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure electric roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our electric rollers are great for privacy and light control and as there is no need for a cord with this blind, this makes this blind inherently child-safe! 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This lush blue electric roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
